Method Detail

resolveConflicts

public java.util.Collection resolveConflicts(IvyNode parent,
                                             java.util.Collection conflicts)
Resolves the eventual conflicts found in the given collection of IvyNode. This method return a Collection of IvyNode which have not been evicted. The returned collection must contain at least one IvyNode. The given conflicts Collection contains at least two IvyNode.

Parameters:
parent - the ivy node parent for which the conflict is to be resolved
conflicts - the collection of IvyNode to check for conflicts
Returns:
a Collection of IvyNode which have not been evicted
